tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Request Doctor to install air conditioner of 1.5 capacity in Tmt room & 2 Ton ac in the hall of the clinic as soon as possible. AC must be on during all Tmt test by default and not at the mercy of Tmt technician to keep AC on in line with international standards with minimum 20 centigrade temperature with full fan speed (unless patient objects).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Ramesh is GOD. Full stop üôè He saved my father who was in critical condition. He gave so much confidence and did a complicated stent implanting after my father suffered severe heart attack. If he and his team had not been there, things would have been very different. His team, both at his clinic and Apollo Bannerghatta Road (Dr. Madhulika and Dr. Naveen), are equally competent and patient centric. I have no other words to thank this noble person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Very bad experience,not at all expected from a institution like this, let me give a short brief which might help others too as I too check review before taking the appointment through practo. So my problem is with Dr Ramesh Lady assistant and partially with the respected doctor too. I went with my dad inside the cabin at that moment some emergency come up so doctor left for emergency Ward(I was not knowing, assistant told me later)  ,so mean while lady assistance asked me required question I gave all the answers politely ,then she told us to go and do ECG and ECO and come back,  I said ma'am we are here for consultation as after putting stent I wanted him(dad) to see a doctor because there are some issues he is facing like cough and allergies nothing else.also now onwards whether we go to General physician for regular checkup or not. can we see the doctor and then we plan accordingly. Rudely,  she told "OK go and wait out side" doctor  will come later as he is occupied, I asked "how long I have to wait ma'am",  "need time " her answer. I asked can u be specific as, if my dad case is not a cardio problem then I need to see general physicia too. Then she said "OK wait for 15-20 min I'll call you. 
Doctor came,  he asked what is the issue patient facing ? Told all of them whatever I said to Lady assist,  then they did whatever they need to, then while Leaving Dr.  Ramesh said " don't be restless we have lot of other patients to check",  so told him clearly "what so ever been communicated to you was wrongly misinterpreted, I never asked I want to meet doctor immediately,  I clearly said I can wait if I know how long I have to".
Now tell me someone when I was restless and when did I said I want to meet Doc asap. 
As he is very senior doc, I don't want to create any nuisance, didn't say anything further and left. 
** ******* ******** *** *** ****** **** **** ***** ***** *** ** **** * ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Ramesh Sir is the most friendly n caring doctor I have ever met, he gave me a new life. I was diagnosed with Dilated cardiomyopathy, he assured me that things would be alright & there‚Äôs no need to worry. Sir implanted pacemaker for me with his magical hands sucessfully. He comforted me like his daughter and personally ensured to check if everything was going smoothly throughout my stay in hospital. I‚Äôm
Glad I met Ramesh Sir n had a wonderful experience. He is my god! Thanks from the bottom of my heart Sirüôè. May god bless a wonderful soul like you. May you help many more lives like mine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I visited for second consultation for my father who was advised to go Angiogram asap by two doctors . Doctor helped me in understanding to focus on my father's health first as he is diabetic and his sugar level were fluctuating and had iron and haemoglobin deficiency and then go for an angiogram. He explained it so nicely and was so friendly in attitude and behavior and helped me to focus on improving moly fathers health first and then go for an angiogram after 6 months. We were so relieved and had joyful tears in eyes. Never going to consult any other doctor ever. Highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My dad had a massive heart attack and undergone 2 stents surgery in heart in Kolkata. He came to Bangalore so consulted the doctor for regular checkup. The doctor is such a nice human being. Very polite and sweet behaviour with the patient. Though he did not change any medication as the doctor who operated my dad is doing awesome treatment, he gave a good hope to my dad and the hearth checkup report he suggested was on the better side. Thank you doctor. Wish all were like you in this industry.

tags: Value for money,
review: Dr B Ramesh is very good, friendly and supportive. He showed empathy towards the patient and their family. He had visited him with the pateint who belonged to a poor family and not so grt financial condition. When I told about the situation to the doctor, he waived of all the charges including his fee. He patiently explained the cardiac issue and treatment plan which could be affordable to the family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
He is simply a great human being and he does his job with full dedication.
Felt very good after meeting him regarding my problem and he solved it in just 10 to 15min . The way he handles his  patients is really great and he will give the exact solution . You doing a great job sir. lots of respect from me

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: visited for irregular heartbeat, suggested me for tests ECG, ECHO screening & tmt  all done in the same place less than an hour. all the test came out normal. Dr Ramesh advised me on some lifestyle changes.. I would strongly recommend dr ramesh. he is very friendly highly experienced.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was a bit scared about my condition , but the doctor helped me understand the situation and did a ECG and Echo then and there and finally concluded my pain is not originated from my heart. Also pointed out my life style flaws and guided to rectify the same. Thank you, Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: So simple and calm. **** ************* at the same time very pleasant. He reviewed my reports with eye for detail. I would recommend Dr Ramesh to anyone who wishes to consult with him on cardiology.

Thanks a lot to him and I highly recommend him to benefit from his vast experience in this field.

review: He is a gem of a doctor, who doesn't write off your concern if they are not life threatening. **** ******* **** **** ** ****** ****** **** ********* ** ****** ******** ** **** ******* **** *** * ***** ********* *** ***** ************ ******* ***** **** *** ***** ** **** ******* *** ** ** *** **** **** * he gives you time, listens to you, and gets to the core of the issue. Most importantly ** ******* **** *********** ** quick diagnosis or medicine untill he truly finds the core of the issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Awesome doctor, I visited around 4-5 doctors for my breathing problem. All of them asked for test and based on test they asked for angiogram. We have visited Dr Ramesh sir and he was the first doctor who use stethoscope to check and then he just saw the reports what we had and listened very patiently and clearly said no heart issue and referred to pulmonologist and now I am feeling fine. One should go to sir with no doubt.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent service **** ********* ******** all the staff r very nice, helpful and cooperative. I personally very much impressed by the Dr. Ramesh cardiologist, well experienced treated me very friendly, cardial and more than that they have every facility like echo, ecg and TMT etc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Ramesh is the kindest and friendliest doctor I have ever met who showed genuine concern for the Overall well being of the patient and that‚Äôs such a rare character to see I‚Äôm doctors these days. I genuinely thank him for his time and effort!

It was all good. Went for a second opinion, but the doctor has explained me the situation well and cleared my doubts in a positive way.

Sir has patiently listened to me and my problems, and got all the required tests done.  
He made sure there is no problem with my heart and just motivated me for being courageous in life.
Nice gesture and calm behaviour.
